qas.question: The immune system protects organisms against what?
What are the agents the immune system detects known as?
Which part of the immune system protects the brain?

answers.text: blood–brain barrier, blood–cerebrospinal fluid barrier, and similar fluid–brain barriers

qas.question: What are the agents detected by the immune system called?

answers.text: innate immune system versus the adaptive immune system
